content.yext/answer:
Our Dime Hillcrest branch has reopened as of April 9, 2020. Please check the modified hours schedule before heading to any branch. 

Thank you, 

Your Dime Community Bank Team

content.yext/answer:

 Ihr Dime Community Bank Team

Gracias,
 
Su equipo de Dime Community Bank

Grazie,

Il tuo team Dime Community Bank
